Speaker: Carefree Security Guard
Text: Are you sure you are supposed to be here?

Speaker: Carefree Security Guard
Text: Oh well, just do not cause any trouble.

Speaker: Clumsy Security Guard
Text: Oh no, where did I leave my ID card?

Speaker: Carry Upgrade Acquired
Text: You can now carry heavy objects.

Speaker: Dash Upgrade Acquired
Text: Press F to quickly dash forward. Works in mid-air.

Speaker: Throw Upgrade Acquired
Text: Thrown objects are twice as fast.

Speaker: Identity Replaced
Text: You now look just like a human.

Speaker: Security Guard
Text: Hey, you can't be in here!
It's locked, and you don't have the keycard.
You unlocked the door with the keycard.

Speaker: Carefree Night Owl
Text: This floor has been under construction for ages.

Speaker: Carefree Night Owl
Text: A lot of random stuff gets left in there by the workers.

Speaker: Carefree Night Owl
Text: And some of the scaffolding seems totally useless...

Speaker: Carefree Night Owl
Text: Oh well! What do I know?

Speaker: Wary Observer
Text: A lot of the people who live here own androids.

Speaker: Wary Observer
Text: They're allowed to walk freely within this building,

Speaker: Wary Observer
Text: since security will apprehend them if they try to leave.

Speaker: Wary Observer
Text: But that probably wouldn't even happen,

Speaker: Wary Observer
Text: since androids can't disobey their programming.

Speaker: Wary Observer
Text: Do you think they could?

Speaker: Off-duty Construction Worker
Text: The view from the top of this building is beautiful.

Speaker: Off-duty Construction Worker
Text: I wish I hadn't lost my roof access key. . .

Speaker: Shopkeeper
Text: This android part makes any model look just like a human.

Speaker: Shopkeeper
Text: I'll sell it to you for three credits.

Speaker: Shopkeeper
Text: Did your owner send you here to pick it up?

Speaker: Shopkeeper
Text: Hey, you aren't allowed behind the counter!

Speaker: Shopkeeper
Text: Thank you for your business! Stay safe out there.

Speaker: Shopkeeper
Text: Huh? Sorry, you don't have enough credits.

Speaker: Shopkeeper
Text: Sorry, I'm all sold out.
